checked-icon.description: The icon to be used when the toggle is on
checked-icon.description_zh: 打开切换开关时要使用的图标

unchecked-icon.description: The icon to be used when the toggle is off
unchecked-icon.description_zh: 切换开关关闭时要使用的图标

indeterminate-icon.description: The icon to be used when the model is indeterminate
indeterminate-icon.description_zh: 模型不确定时要使用的图标

icon-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
icon-color.desc: Override default icon color (for truthy state only); Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
icon-color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称
